case.title: Heartbeat Message (0x00)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

case.title: Acknowledge Message (0x20)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

case.title: Data Message (0x21)
case.description:
Direction: Sensor -> Gateway
Communication trigger: timer triggered
graphics/D2-10-30_MID21.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Measured relative air humidity
(0.5% steps)
Indicates whether an open window has been detected
Indicates if the occupancy button was pressed or is still in automatic mode
Indicates the current room control mode

Measured room temperature
(0.1K steps)
Indicates whether the motion sensor detected a movement
Indicates the current fan speed level

Indicates the current temperature set point as an absolute value
(0.5K steps)
Indicates the current temperature set point as a relative value in Kelvin (0.5K steps)
Analog measured value

case.title: Status Message (0x22)
case.description:
Direction: Sensor -> Gateway
Communication trigger: event triggered
graphics/D2-10-30_MID22.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Indicates the user interface type
Mold warning and prevention advice
Indicates the current main display content
Device status info code
Indicates the current party or holiday status
Indicates the current heating or cooling status
Indicates the current sun or moon icon status
Indicates the daylight saving time (summertime)
Indicates the current autonomous level, e.g. the device operates autonomic in stand-alone-mode or is fully controlled by a controller
Device energy state, e. g. battery power status
Indicates if the device is actually powered by its solar panel

Temperature set point for vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

Temperature set point for eco room mode
(0.5K steps)

Temperature set point for comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: Actuator Status (0x23)
case.description:
Direction: Sensor -> Gateway
Communication trigger: event triggered
graphics/D2-10-30_MID23.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Current valve 1 position
(1% steps)

Current valve 2 position
(1% steps)

Current valve 3 position
(1% steps)

Current valve 4 position
(1% steps)

Temperature of actuator 1
(5K steps)

Temperature of actuator 2
(5K steps)

Temperature of actuator 3
(5K steps)

Temperature of actuator 4
(5K steps)
Actuator 1 status
Actuator 2 status
Actuator 3 status
Actuator 4 status

case.title: Set Point Limits Status (0x24)
case.description:
Direction: Sensor -> Gateway
Communication trigger: event triggered
graphics/D2-10-30_MID24.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Temperature set point range relative. The given value indicates the maximum permissible offset (positive or negative) to the temperature set point.
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the economic room mode
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the economic room mode
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: Configuration Message (0x61)
case.description:
Direction: bidirectional
Communication trigger: silent acknowledge
graphics/D2-10-30_MID61.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Indicates if the PIR status is transmitted
Indicates if the temperature scale (°C/°F) can be changed at the room control panel
Indicates if the display content can be changed at the room control panel, e.g. toggle button
Indicates if date and time can be changed at the room control panel
Indicates if the time program can be changed at the room control panel, in menu or auto adaptation
Indicates if the occupancy button and menu entry is blocked at the room control panel, e.g. 2 = only menu entry is blocked, 3 = button and menu is blocked
Indicates if the temperature set point are allowed to be changed at the room control panel
Indicates if the fan speed can be changed at the room control panel
Indicates if the holiday feature can be activated at the room control panel
Indicates if the time bar is now activated, or not activated, or even the configuration is blocked
Season energy saving mode, e.g. Summer-Mode
Indicates what mold warning signal is activated
Defines room specific mold warning delta in degree kelvin
Defines Room specific mold warning limit for heating
Indicates what content is allowed to display. 8 Bits masked. Multiple choices are allowed.
The configurable interval is 1 per minute to 1 per day. It defines the longest time between two consecutive telegrams. (default = 600 s)
Defines the used temperature scale for the room control panel display and menus
Defines Room specific heating coefficient in degree kelvin per hour
Indicates if only the hidden keys or all keys (front side and back side) on the device are locked
Window open detection stopping time

case.title: Clock Setup (0x62)
case.description:
Direction: bidirectional
Communication trigger: silent acknowledge
graphics/D2-10-30_MID62.png

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Defines the used time notation
Day
Month
Year = 2000 + x
Minute
Indicates if an update of date and time is provided by the gateway
Hour

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Room Temperature Override (0x80)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Room temperature override
(0.1K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Recent Temperature Set Point Override Absolute (0x81)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Recent temperature set point override absolute

datafield.data: Recent Temperature Set Point Override Absolute
datafield.description:
Recent temperature set point override absolute
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Recent Temperature Set Point Override Relative (0x82)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Recent temperature set point override relative

datafield.data: Recent Temperature Set Point Offset Override
datafield.description:
Recent temperature set point override relative offset, in Kelvin
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – External Value (0x83)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Display representation for
external value,
scaling and unit

item.description:
Temperature
valid range 0 … 1000,
scale -40 … 60,
0.1K steps,
unit = °C

Humidity
valid range 0 … 200,
scale 0 … 100,
0.5% steps,
unit = % RH

CO2/VOC
valid range 0 … 1000,
scale 0 … 5000,
5ppm steps,
unit = ppm

VOC
valid range 0 … 100,
scale 0 … 100,
1% steps,
unit = %

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Humidity Override (0x84)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Humidity override
(0.5% steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Fan Speed Override (0x85)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Fan speed display symbol override

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Room Mode Override (0x86)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Room mode override

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Open Window Override (0x87)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Open window override

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – PIR Override (0x88)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
PIR override, e.g. a single movement from an external sensor detected

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Occupancy Override (0x89)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the room in occupied or unoccupied mode

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Set Display Advice Symbol (0x8A)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Set display advice symbol

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Autonomous Level Override (0x8B)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the autonomous level and defines the general control mode of the device, e.g. the device operates autonomic in stand-alone-mode or is fully controlled by a controller

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Set Display Cooling/Heating Symbol (0x8C)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the cooling/heating icon in the display

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Set Display Sun/Moon Symbol (0x8D)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the sun/moon icon in the display

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Display Content Override (0x8E)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the display to a specific mode

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Daylight Saving Time Override (0x8F)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Sets the summer time to the automatic mode or to a certain value

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Set User Defined Info Code (0x90)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
User defined information code are to be displayed

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Temperature Set Point Vacation Mode (0x91)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Sets the temperature set point for the vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Temperature Set Point Comfort Mode (0x92)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Sets the temperature set point for the comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Temperature Set Point Eco Mode (0x93)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Sets the temperature set point for the economic room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode (0x94)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Upper temperature set point limit vacation mode

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode (0x95)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Lower temperature set point limit vacation mode

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Vacation Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the vacation room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode (0x96)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Upper temperature set point limit eco mode

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the economic room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode (0x97)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Lower temperature set point limit eco mode

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Eco Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the economic room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode (0x98)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Upper temperature set point limit comfort mode

datafield.data: Upper Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the upper limit of the temperature set point for the comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode (0x99)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

item.description: Lower temperature set point limit comfort mode

datafield.data: Lower Temperature Set Point Limit Comfort Mode
datafield.description:
Sets the lower limit of the temperature set point for the comfort room mode
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Temperature Set Point Range Relative (0x9A)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier

Temperature set point range relative in Kelvin, e.g. 10K sets a -10K … +10K maximum permissible offset
(0.5K steps)

case.title: COMMAND MESSAGE – Energy Saving Mode Override (0x9B)

datafield.description: Defines the message identifier
Energy saving mode override, e.g. no heating in summertime
